name: Tech Mahindra
title: Software Engineer
summary: Led the design and digitization of a cloud-native simulation tool, enhanced the automation by over 70% and improving report management

Employed Monte Carlo simulation which improved forecast prediction by over 90% and directly correlating with a 30% increase in sales. Optimized algorithm performance with multi-threading and asynchronous programming.

Managed TCP/IP, secure HTTP connections and optimized DNS infrastructure using Route 53 on AWS Cloud, Improved the product's fault-tolerance using health checks and failover policies, ensuring reliability of service, and enhancing user experience.

name: Infosys
title: Senior Systems Engineer
summary: Optimized API automation tool, cutting execution time by 80% with caching, rate limiting, Kafka, and asynchronous requests.
Enhanced quality assurance with code reviews and test-driven development, reducing defects by 60%.
Boosted user count from 800 to 3000 by integrating Jaeger, Grafana, and Apache Jmeter; developed image processing algorithms with BDD.
